Text: The Ferlo Sud Wildlife Reserve (French: "Réserve de Faune du Ferlo-Sud" ), established in 1972, is a 6337 km2 IUCN habitat and species protected nature reserve located in Senegal.
Triplets:<The Ferlo Sud Wildlife Reserve
1:
--------------------
<Text: Ferlo Sud Wildlife Reserve:  The nature reserve is bordered by the Ferlo Nord Wildlife Reserve to the north.>
